UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthesis and antimicrobial activity of cysteine-free coprisin nonapeptides
Literature.Author: Lee J, Lee D, Choi H, Kim HH, Kim H, Hwang JS, Lee DG, Kim JI

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium KCCM 12118(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis KCCM 29212(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51575(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCCM 40510(MIC=16µg/ml)
